RelatedSentence: A Ridgefield High School science research student has won an all expenses paid trip to the Large Hadron Collider facility in Geneva , Switzerland , according to a release from the Connecticut Science and Engineering Fair .

A Ridgefield High School science research student has won an all expenses paid trip to the Large Hadron Collider facility in Geneva , Switzerland , according to a release from the Connecticut Science and Engineering Fair .

Senior Isabelle Goldstein earned the prize for her research topic , Partitioning Gamma - Ray Sources in Fermi Large Area Telescope Observations for Spatial and Spectral Analysis , at the Intel International Science and Engineering Fair in Los Angeles .
